RoboP | Feb 9, 2017 4:03 AM
Tessa from FMP, Nene Romanova from BGC 2040 and so many others.
Hillary has this soft tender toned voice it's good for characters in a different range.
Not just younger aged characters but say for instance with the case of Nene, she comes off as a younger, spunkier, playful type and she capturers that energy well in her voice naturally.

And she can do heart rending stuff too.


Vulcanlp | Jan 26, 2017 11:09 PM
She did really well as Katyusha In Girls und Panzer. Easily one of the best performances in that work.
